Control Name: 5.5.5 Application configuration is stored using a dedicated configuration management system (Azure App Configuration, Azure Key Vault etc.)
Control Statement: Application configuration information can be stored together with the application itself or preferably using a dedicated configuration management system like Azure App Configuration or Azure Key Vault. Keys and secrets shouldn't be included in application configuration.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.5 Is the workload developed and configured in a secure way?
